results.title: Prague 2000
results.brief_description: This tour of the beautiful city of Prague in the Czech Republic presents the rich history and full range of museums, churches and palaces of Bohemian kings. Beginning in the Old Town Square, we travel across the famous Charles Bridge to Mala Strana and Hradcany to visit all of the famous tourist destinations within the city and along the Vltava River. Highlights include St Nicholas Church, Franz Kafka’s house and museum, the Jewish Quarter, Prague Castle, the Infant Jesus of Prague, Dvorak Hall and Prague Zoo.

results.title: Practising headsprings
results.brief_description: A demonstration of training methods for performing headsprings. Introductory shot of clowns doing headsprings in the circus ring. The remainder of the film is photographed in a gymnasium; an expert gymnast demonstrates practice movements for different parts of the activity and shows how these parts are combined in the complete headspring.

results.title: Practice makes perfect drivers
results.brief_description: Lists a number of ways in which a motorist may improve his driving techniques; driving on rough roads and under bad weather conditions; passing other vehicles on the road; control of a vehicle in a skid, when dlipping under icy conditions and after a blowout; recommended techniques for driving at dusk and under night conditions.

results.title: Practical organic chemistry: simple techniques for the preparation of solids
results.creator_credit: State Film Centre of Victoria and M.E. Fox
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the preparation of organic compounds taking place in three stages: reaction isolation and purification. Phenol reacts with benzol; chloride with alkaline solution to give rhenyl benzoate; solium chloride with water. All steps in the isolation of phenol and acetophenone semi-carbazone are demonstrated.

results.title: Practical film making
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Julian Films, Julian Bercovici and Bill Brame
results.brief_description: Traces the production of an independent feature film from selection of the script to the final editing, emphasising at each step the importance of planning; gives an insight into the roles of the main crew members and practical production tips.

results.title: Pozzuoli: death of a city
results.brief_description: Examines the history of volcanic activity in the area surrounding Pozzuoli and the problems of resettlement. Earthquakes have already destroyed 60% of the City. The impending disaster of a volcanic eruption is discussed and compared with the Mt. St Helen’s eruption of 1980, the Mt Pelee disaster in Martinique in 1902 and the eruption of Vesuvius in 79AD.

results.title: Powers of ten
results.brief_description: An entirely new colour production of the Eamses “Rough sketch for a proposed film” (1968). Shows a linear view of our universe - first from the human scale to the sea of galaxies, then directly down to the nucleus of a carbon atom. With an image, a narration and a distance register it gives a clue to the relative size of things.

results.title: Powerlines for electricity
results.brief_description: Cable making industry in Australia. From the raw materials of copper , lead , aluminium, rubber and plastic we follow the process to the finished products. Shows the light flexible cable for domestic use as telephone and ironing cords; and heavy cables used in elevators, and mobile cranes; finishes with the making and laying of the co-axial cable which now links the telecommunications systems between Melbourne, Canberra and Sydney.
